sourceInfo.title: Data Source
sourceInfo.description: This trading data uses real-time economic information from Forex Factory, ensuring accuracy and reliability for your trading decisions.
sourceInfo.updateNote: Events are updated continuously throughout the trading day to keep you informed of important economic releases and market-moving news.

cookies.heading: We use cookies
cookies.description: Essential cookies keep Time 2 Trade running. Ads use Google AdSense and Meta Pixel for measurement. Ads can stay non-personalized unless you allow them.

pushPermission.title: Enable Push Notifications
pushPermission.description: You have reminders set up with push notifications enabled. To receive them on this device, please allow notifications when prompted.
pushPermission.hint: You can change this anytime in your browser settings.

notificationPermission.title: Enable Notifications
notificationPermission.description: You have reminders set up that use notifications. To receive them on this device, please allow notifications when prompted.
notificationPermission.hint: You can change this anytime in your browser settings.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.deviceNotRegisteredHint: Permission granted but this device is not registered. Tap to register.
notifications.grantedHint: You will receive push notifications on this device.
notifications.deniedHint: You blocked notifications. Change this in browser settings.
notifications.defaultHint: Enable to receive reminders on this device.
notifications.enabled: Push notifications enabled for this device.
notifications.disabled: This device has been unregistered from push notifications.
notifications.enableError: Failed to enable notifications. Please try again.
notifications.disableError: Failed to unregister device. Please try again.
notifications.deniedError: You denied the notification permission. To enable, go to browser settings.
notifications.deniedInstructions: To enable notifications, go to your browser settings and allow notifications for this site.
notifications.blockedExplanation: Notifications are currently blocked for this site. You'll need to change this in your browser settings to receive reminders.
notifications.afterEnabling: After enabling notifications, refresh this page and tap "Enable Push Notifications" again.

quietHours.title: Quiet Hours
quietHours.description: Mute notifications during specified hours. Great for avoiding late-night alerts.
quietHours.saveError: Failed to save quiet hours settings.
quietHours.disabledInfo: Notifications will be sent at any time. Enable quiet hours to mute during sleep or focus time.
